::CyberShark::

    He couldn't take anymore of her suffering. He reached f=
or the plug on Vulois, then stopped. He decided to make sure the connection=
 could be taken out. He pulled a pocket scanner from his side and waved it =
over Battera and Vulois.
    "Unable to read," The computer read.
    "Bloo=
dy Pit!!" He muttered to himself. There was no way of telling if they could=
 be separated safely.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: logomorph@hot=
mail.com 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, October 26, 2000 5:45=
 PM
  Subject: Re: Major Developments


  ::Battera::
  She cried as Vulios=
 shot at her again.  He got up from the throne and 
  walked over to her, l=
aughing,"Your no match for me!" as he kicked her 
  in the stomach. She gro=
aned and cried as he kept kicking her.

  Her body twitched and jerked.

  =
She pleaded to him,"Please, Vulois, I beg you, stop this. You forgave 
  me=
 once and.." she was cut short as he kicked her again. She groaned 
  and l=
ayed on the floor, crying and begging.  Vulois just laughed and 
  drew his=
 gun again.  He shot her in the legs and laughed evily at her 
  while she =
lay there, leaking and crying.  he kicked her again in the 
  stomach and k=
icked her across the room.  He walked over to her, 
  grabbed her leash and=
 dragged her back to his throne.  He tied the 
  leash to the arm of the th=
rone and laughed, "You sniveling little 
  coward. You will now the pain th=
at I suffered.  You left me to die, 
  now, it will be your turn."  Vulois =
stood up and stood next to 
  her. "How shall I kill thee, let me count the=
 ways." He took out a 
  whip and started whipping her.  She felt the sting=
 of the whip on her 
  back and wings. The energon whip tore part of her wi=
ng and started 
  cutting into her back.  She cried out with each crack of =
the whip. 
  But Vulois continued.  He finally stopped as she lay there, al=
most 
  unconsious.  He picked her up and slapped her in the face,"Wake up =

  you pathetic little insect. I'm not done with you yet."  All she 
  coul=
d do was cry from the pain and fear that she felt.




        eGroups Spon=
sor
